price: Afei ne Wura Nyankopͻn yii no (sε nkͻmhyεni), de ne bͻne kyεε no, kyerεε (no) kwan.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
